title: Visa inc | SSE | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech from IIT
Years of Experience: 2.6
Prior Experience: SMTS at top product based company (Non-Faang)
Date of the Offer: Feb 2024
Company: Visa Inc
Title/Level: Senior software engineer
Location: bangalore , KA
Salary: 33 lac Rupees fixed(Including PF)
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 33 lac for 3 years (11 lac per year)
Bonus: 3 lac , but can go upto 6 lac based on performance
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 47 lpa
Benefits: Standard Visa Benifits
Other details: Negotiated once, and the above was the final figure . No more negotiation was allowed after this .

Offer Declined , as my current CTC was 1-2 lac more and remote. Currently moving to blr was hard due to personal issues .
